Package comp3111.covid

Class ChartNAController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.covid.ChartNAController
public class ChartNAController
extends java.lang.Object
A Controller for NATable, which is the table that displays details about data that is supposed to be plotted in chart, but is unavailable from the dataset. It handles all the operations on NATable, e.g. add/ remove data.

    void addPairs​(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,​java.time.LocalDate>> list)
    Same as the other addPairs variant, however, this one takes in a list of unavailable pairs.
    void addPairs​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.time.LocalDate,​java.lang.Double>> mapOfCountries)
    The method accepts a map produced by ChartDataAnalysis.getChartData() and filters all country-date pair that is unavailable from the dataset, each of the pair is added to the naData list.

    • onChange

      private void onChange​(javafx.collections.ListChangeListener.Change<? extends javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,​java.time.LocalDate>> e)
      The method invoked when the list of naData is changed. Button is hidden when the list is empty, visible otherwise.
      Parameters:
      e - the event

    • addPairs

      public void addPairs​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.time.LocalDate,​java.lang.Double>> mapOfCountries)
      The method accepts a map produced by ChartDataAnalysis.getChartData() and filters all country-date pair that is unavailable from the dataset, each of the pair is added to the naData list.
      Parameters:
      mapOfCountries - a map obtained from ChartDataAnalysis.getChartData()

    • addPairs

      public void addPairs​(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,​java.time.LocalDate>> list)
      Same as the other addPairs variant, however, this one takes in a list of unavailable pairs.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of pairs to be added to naData list

    • removePairs

      public void removePairs​(java.lang.String country)

      Parameters:
      country - country to be removed
